creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: six silhouetted figures on a small hill; four figures wear caps with very tall feathers; one figure carries a large sack on his back; one figure has a walking stick; full moon on horizon behind figures; two tall trees with thin trunks at right and left edges of image; printed in black
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: [#1706A]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
signed: LRC, below image, in pencil: [Richard Holzschuh]
title: Gathering to be in Front of Moon
